titleStmt.title: A godlie, zealous, and profitable sermon vpon the second chapter of Saint Iames. Preached at London, by Master George Gifford, and published at the request of sundry godly and well disposed persons
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas East] for Tobie Cooke, dwelling at the Tigers head in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon on the second of S. Iames.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Tigers head in Paules Churchyard
